Class PreferenceUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ui.PreferenceUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PreferenceUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    PreferenceUI object to read, write preference object Also it represent a window for setting user preference
    Author:
    ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team8
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • PreferenceUI

        public PreferenceUI(java.lang.String name)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        constructor for Preference UI who tries to read preference object from disk generate a frame
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of preference object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the file not exit, throw exception and let main deal with it
